duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and developing item specific training
Utilize science expertise in item development and scoring, including knowledge of Life Sciences and Physical Sciences
Communicate and interact with various roles daily via email, chat, phone, and videoconference meetings
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in the expectations of their roles and how to perform those duties
Train and provide expertise in Science and potentially Math assessments to a large and varied scorer population

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred
